meanings.definition: Resembling foam in appearance or texture.
meanings.sent1: The soap created a foamlike layer on top of the water.
meanings.sent2: The cappuccino had a foamlike froth on top.
meanings.sent3: The foamlike clouds in the sky looked like a fluffy blanket.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was so intense, it bubbled up inside her like a foamlike explosion.
meanings.sent5: The foamlike waves crashed against the shore with a gentle touch.

meanings.definition: Having a frothy or bubbly quality.
meanings.sent1: The soda had a foamlike fizz when poured into the glass.
meanings.sent2: The champagne was so bubbly and foamlike.
meanings.sent3: The foamlike bubbles in the bath made her giggle.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was so contagious, it spread through the room like a foamlike eruption.
meanings.sent5: The foamlike texture of the milkshake made it extra enjoyable to sip.
